item.title: Paigham Bot 9.0.7.6
item.description: Name : Paigham Bot Version : 9.0.7.6 OS : Windows Type : Traffic Generator Software Price : $499 Homepage : SalePage Paigham Bot is one of the most effective marketing applications on the market today. It is able to accurately gather data from search engines in any industry or niche and provides contact details for businesses and people that are most important to you i.e. YOUR MOST PRIZED PROSPECTS-AND WILL CONTACT THEM FOR YOU.
item.yandex:full-text: Features BRAND NEW USER INTERFACE (allows for easier user application management) New Keyword Management Module(Manually add, edit, delete and track your keywords) New Search Engine Selectors (Additional Google.com extensions) Separate Scraping and Posting Modules (Allows for easier campaign management) Advanced Tag Control Module Tag Collector Enhanced targeting abilities with the Smart Niche & Search Engine Filters. Powerful Short Codes-Incorporate data from each site into your message Updated Captcha Solving API Integration (Use your DBC account to solve captcha’s) Individual Module reports (exportable txt and csv files) Two Proxy Management Integration tools (Upload Proxies or Connect Your HMA Account) Acquire Data From Your Audience (Social Accounts, Phone #’s, emails and more) Directly contact your audience automatically (Has ability to post to 100 sites per minute) Multiple Posting Variations (Send 100% Unique Messages To Each Prospect) Footprint Management Tools (Easily modify your search engine operators) Scraping Throttle (Control how fast Paigham Bot Finds new sites) Multi-Threading Abilities (Run up to 20 Posting threads)

  • Scraping Throttle (Control how fast Paigham Bot Finds new sites)
  • Multi-Threading Abilities (Run up to 20 Posting threads)

item.title: Yellow Pages Scraper 1.0.3.21
item.description: Name : Yellow Pages Scraper (Australia, USA & CA, USA & India, Europe, Global ) Version : 1.0.3.21 OS : Windows Type : Yellow Pages Scraper Price : $90 Homepage : SalePage Use our Yellow Pages Scraper to Build your Own Database for Marketing Purpose This Management-Ware yellow pages scraper software can be used to scrape the name, address, city, state, zip code, phone & fax number, email address (if there is one) and webpage from any listing, city or state (in the USA) posted in the yellow pages. This yellow pages extractor program will help you convert web data into CSV or other format, and save your time instead of collecting manually. You can also use a find email option to look for the email addresses of your contacts.
item.yandex:full-text: Features Targeted search for emails using keywords Using Email Address Finder, you can search email addresses using any keyword or filter type that he or she pleases. Search for email address parameters can be set so that addresses are filtered by gender, age, ethnicity, or another factor. For example, a business with children’s products can search for emails belonging to parents with young children. A company selling items that would interest a senior citizen could choose out emails belonging to senior citizens. Yellow pages extractors features Number of records you can extract (Unlimited) Search/ Extract by keyword (One or many keywords) Search/ Extract by URL (One or many URLs) Search by keyword / by categories / by custom categories Support Proxy (Hide your IP Address) Save search results (CSV, Excel, html, PDF) Support many types of output format If you need other features to satisfy your requirements. Please contact us. Contact List Manager with duplicates check All our yellow pages scrapers not only helps you find leads online but also set up a database with the information. After extracting the yellow pages of your choice, the program will automatically check the database to make sure there are no duplicate entries. The program sets up its own database for the contacts that have been extracted and there is no limit on how long such a list can be. Currently we are offering yellow pages scraper for 4 different countries. Each country are distribute with seperate installer. You can a special edition that is including USA and Canada. Yellow Pages Scraper for Global: Support yellowpages.com Support superpages.com Support yellowpages.ca Support pagesjaunes.ca Support superpages.ca Support yellowpages.com.au Support truelocal.com.au Support yell.com Support thomsonlocal.com Support yellow.co.nz Support finda.co.nz Yellow Pages Scraper for USA: Support yellowpages.com Support superpages.com Yellow Pages Scraper for Canada: Support yellowpages.ca Support pagesjaunes.ca Support superpages.ca Yellow Pages Scraper for Australia: Support yellowpages.com.au Support truelocal.com.au Yellow Pages Scraper for Europe: Support yell.com Support thomsonlocal.com Yellow Pages Scraper for USACanada: Support yellowpages.com Support superpages.com Support yellowpages.ca Support pagesjaunes.ca Support superpages.ca Yellow Pages Scraper for CustomScript: Support superpagespr.com Support iqpf.org Support twilio.com Support rccaq.com Yellow Pages Scraper for UK: Support yell.com Support thomsonlocal.com Yellow Pages Scraper for India: Support yellowpages.co.in Support indianyellowpages.com Yellow Pages Scraper for USAIndia: Support yellowpages.com Support superpages.com Support yellowpages.co.in Support indianyellowpages.com Yellow Pages Scraper for HongKong: Support yp.com.hk Support ypmap.com Yellow Pages Scraper for Yelp: Support yelp.com Yellow Pages Scraper for Facebook: google.com bing.com Yellow Pages Scraper for Linkedin: google.com bing.com Yellow Pages Scraper for NewZealand: Support yellow.co.nz Support finda.co.nz Yellow Pages Scraper for AustraliaAndNZ: Support yellowpages.com.au Support truelocal.com.au Support yellow.co.nz Support finda.co.nz
item.turbo:content:
Features


Targeted search for emails using keywords
Using Email Address Finder, you can search email addresses using any keyword or filter type that he or she pleases. Search for email address parameters can be set so that addresses are filtered by gender, age, ethnicity, or another factor. For example, a business with children’s products can search for emails belonging to parents with young children. A company selling items that would interest a senior citizen could choose out emails belonging to senior citizens.
Yellow pages extractors features
  • Number of records you can extract (Unlimited)
  • Search/ Extract by keyword (One or many keywords)
  • Search/ Extract by URL (One or many URLs)
  • Search by keyword / by categories / by custom categories
  • Support Proxy (Hide your IP Address)
  • Save search results (CSV, Excel, html, PDF)
  • Support many types of output format
  • If you need other features to satisfy your requirements. Please contact us.

Contact List Manager with duplicates check
All our yellow pages scrapers not only helps you find leads online but also set up a database with the information. After extracting the yellow pages of your choice, the program will automatically check the database to make sure there are no duplicate entries. The program sets up its own database for the contacts that have been extracted and there is no limit on how long such a list can be.

Currently we are offering yellow pages scraper for 4 different countries. Each country are distribute with seperate installer. You can a special edition that is including USA and Canada.

After entering these information when you will click on the get data option after that all information will be extracted. As you know yellow pages are list of telephone directory of businesses. Now yellow pages also started to be used to notify online directory of the businesses. item.title: Paigham Daily Deal Bot 2.0.1.3
item.description: Name : Paigham Daily Deal Bot Version : 2.0.1.1 OS : Windows Type : Local Marketing Bot Price : $47 Homepage : SalePage This is a separate application from the main Paigham Bot software, designed to collect business details from companies actively advertising their products/services. Although a unique data scraping application itself, it also works in conjunction with the main Paigham Bot software by mining additional contact details on the businesses, looking for contact form pages on their website that one can use to directly load in Paigham Bot and start contacting these companies right away to market your service/products. What Does the Daily Deal Bot Do? A user can geo target companies according to State, City Locality and can even target according to business category. Use this to market to other businesses or for list building (contact form lists for Paigham Bot, email lists, call center phone lists and social media marketing lists etc.) Currently it scrapes, crawls and mines Groupon’s entire US database of active advertisers currently marketing their businesses. (We have future updates planned to also include other ad/business.comworks, such as Living Social etc).
item.yandex:full-text: Features What Data Does It Collect? The listed Groupon offer for the Business (Deal Link Page included) Website Details Email Details Phone Number Details Facebook Details Twitter Details Linkedin Details

item.description: Name : Google and Bing Maps Extractor Version : 2.07 OS : Windows Type : Local Marketing Bot, Email Extractor Price : $120 Homepage : SalePage Google maps contact extractor - Grab and manage Google Maps information. Fresh propect list ready for you… Inte.com has many sources of free leads that you can use to market your product or service. Google and Bing Maps Contact Extractor allows you to build your own contact list / prospect list from Google and Bing Maps database. If you are looking for a quick and easy way to capture contact information such as business name, address, Website, emails, phone number from Google and Bing Maps then, Google and Bing Maps Contact Extractor is the marketing tool that you need for telemarketing. No special knowledge is required to learn. With Google and Bing Maps contact Extractor, purchase process will never be that complicated. Find your suppliers and prospects online from Google Maps and send them your promotions! Stop copying manually the details from Google and Bing Maps. Let Google and Bing Maps Extractor do it for you! Don’t spend money to buy outdated information, using our Web data extractor software to get updated information from the Google and Bing Maps database! DON’T BUY OUTDATED LEADS DATABASE…BUILD YOUR OWN, USE OUR CONTACT EXTRACTOR SOFTWARE!!!

Google and Bing Maps Contact Extractor is a very fast program and supports multi-threaded page loading. Our web data extractor software collects contacts easily using Google and Bing Maps database.
